name: Stephanie T. Cheung
body:
## About Me
Hi! My name is Stephanie. I'm a PhD student in [Biomedical Engineering](http://www.neuroscience.utoronto.ca/) and the [Collaborative Program in Neuroscience](http://www.neuroscience.utoronto.ca/) at the University of Toronto. I do my research at the [Bloorview Research Institute](http://research.hollandbloorview.ca/BRIHome), creating and evaluating fun, home-based rehabilitation therapies to improve motor control in children with cerebral palsy. To design these interventions, I am merging principles in music-supported rehabilitation and video game therapy. My advisors are [Dr. Joyce Chen](http://sunnybrook.ca/research/team/member.asp?m=509&page=172) and [Dr. Elaine Biddiss](http://research.hollandbloorview.ca/scientist/Elaine-Biddiss).

## Some Past Projects
Physiological Models of Impaired Hearing (2012 - 2014)
* With [Dr. Ian Bruce](http://www.ece.mcmaster.ca/~ibruce), I used computational models of the auditory brainstem and midbrain to investigate sound localization with and without the use of hearing aids. You can read more in [my thesis](https://macsphere.mcmaster.ca/handle/11375/16032)

Biomusic (2010)
* [Dr. Elaine Biddiss](http://research.hollandbloorview.ca/scientist/Elaine-Biddiss), [Elizabeth Han](http://elizabethhan.com), and I created an auditory interface that allows children with profound disabilities to communicate anxiety. We mapped several physiological indicators of anxiety to sound, creating lively "biomusic". You can find out more at the [PEARL Lab website](http://research.hollandbloorview.ca/ResearchCentresLabs/PEARLLab/CurrentResearch/ResearchAreas).

## Education
MASc in [Electrical & Computer Engineering](http://www.ece.mcmaster.ca/index.html), McMaster University, Canada
* thesis supervised by [Dr. Ian Bruce](http://www.ece.mcmaster.ca/~ibruce)

BEng in [Electrical & Biomedical Engineering](http://www.ece.mcmaster.ca/2biomed.html), McMaster University, Canada
* thesis supervised by [Dr. Laurel Trainor](trainorlab.mcmaster.ca), [Dr. Hubert de Bruin](http://www.ece.mcmaster.ca/faculty/debruin/debruin/index.htm), [Dr. Takako Fujioka](https://ccrma.stanford.edu/people/takako-fujioka)
* capstone supervised by [Dr. Hubert de Bruin](http://www.ece.mcmaster.ca/faculty/debruin/debruin/index.htm)

ARCT in Piano Performance, [Royal Conservatory of Music](https://www.rcmusic.ca/), Canada
* teachers: [Tanya Tkachenko](http://www.tanyatkachenko.com/), [Boris Zarankin](http://offcentremusic.com/about.html)

## Other Stuff
* [EngineerGirl](http://www.engineergirl.org/) is a great resource for girls interested in engineering.
* I support the work of [Engineers Without Borders](http://www.ewb.ca/) to drive systemic, positive change. 
* [Captain Janeway](http://en.memory-alpha.wikia.com/wiki/Kathryn_Janeway) is the best captain.
* [Squirrel Girl](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Unbeatable_Squirrel_Girl) is the best superhero.

## Find Me Online

* My [NeuroTree](http://neurotree.org/neurotree/tree.php?pid=96896)
* Or email me at **stephaniet[dot]cheung[at]utoronto[dot]ca**
